Original question: Evaluate log_(10)(tan 1)+log_(10)(tan 2)+log_(10)(tan 3)+...+log_(10)(tan 88)+log_(10)(tan 89). All angles are in degrees.
Codex code:
import math

print(sum(math.log10(math.tan(math.radians(i))) for i in range(1, 90)))
Codex code explanation:
1. math.log10(x) returns the base-10 logarithm of x.
2. math.tan(x) returns the tangent of x radians.
3. math.radians(x) converts x from degrees to radians.
4. math.tan(math.radians(x)) returns the tangent of x degrees.
5. math.log10(math.tan(math.radians(x))) returns the base-10 logarithm of the tangent of x degrees.
6. sum(math.log10(math.tan(math.radians(i))) for i in range(1, 90)) returns the sum of the base-10 logarithms of the tangents of the angles from 1 to 89 degrees.
